re:Clojure

Virtual Conference

Soon, 2021

re:Clojure is a community-driven effort to bring together knowledgeable speakers to present new and exciting topics on all things Clojure and ClojureScript.

It is our intention to keep the conferences lean, inclusive and rewarding to all attendees and to promote other Clojure conferences in Europe and worldwide.
